text: Udo Schaefer (October 19, 1926 – August 30, 2019) was a German lawyer and a Bahá'í writer. He was born in Heidelberg, Germany. He was known for his writing Bahá'í Ethics in Light of Scripture and Beyond the Clash of Religions: The Emergence of a New Paradigm. Schaefer died on August 30, 2019 at the age of 92.Udo Schaefer verstorben ==Works== * * * * * * * ==References== ==Other websites== *English Books *English articles Category:1926 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Writers from Baden-Württemberg Category:Bahá'ís Category:Lawyers from Baden-Württemberg
title: Udo Schaefer
